title: Video: The Tech of the Women’s Gravel Worlds Is More Intriguing than Any Cobbled Classic
content:
A new Cannondale gravel bike, Vos' Gravaa Gear, Lapierre's Crosshill and many more bikes made an appearance at the race in Belgium.

Read the full article at Video: The Tech of the Women’s Gravel Worlds Is More Intriguing than Any Cobbled Classic on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
